title: Cluster Science Centre Extended Mission
abstractText: The Cluster Science Centre at Imperial provides science direction, software, and support to the UK community (and via Cluster Science Data System the wider Cluster community) for multi-instrument, multi-spacecraft science from ESA's high profile cornerstone Cluster space plasma mission. These activities include the provision of a unique world-class software analysis and visualisation package (QSAS) and a variety of data standardisation, formatting, and translation tools. The funding include here covers the period 1 October 2008 through 30 September 2009 that forms part of the Cluster extended mission.
